verses.verse: Those who trust<WH982> in Yahweh<WH3068> are as Mount<WH2022> Zion,<WH6726> which can't<WH4131> be moved, but remains<WH3427> forever.<WH5769>
As the mountains<WH2022> surround<WH5439> Jerusalem,<WH3389> so Yahweh<WH3068> surrounds<WH5439> his people<WH5971> from this time forth and<WH5704> forevermore.<WH5769>

For the scepter<WH7626> of wickedness<WH7562> won't<WH5117> remain over the allotment<WH5117> of the righteous;<WH6662> so<WH4616> that the righteous<WH6662> won't<WH7971> use their hands<WH3027> to do evil.<WH5766>
Do good,<WH2895> Yahweh,<WH3068> to those who are good,<WH2896> to those who are upright<WH3477> in their hearts.<WH3826>
But as for those who turn aside<WH5186> to their crooked ways,<WH6128> Yahweh<WH3068> will lead them away<WH3212> with the workers<WH6466> of iniquity.<WH205> Peace<WH7965> be on Israel.<WH3478>
